title: Microsoft Gill Sans
content:
Hi,   
I have visited Ascender Corp. site where one can buy Microsoft's fonts. Between Verdana, Georgia and Nina I found Gill Sans (R). I thought it was Montotype's typeface. Am I right? Or not?   
I know that it's possible to buy it at Adobe, Monotype Imaging, Linotype and Ascender. The prices are different. And what about fonts. Are they different?   
   
artur
author: artur

comments.content:
Ascender has rights to various fonts that Microsoft has rights to sublicense (not just the obvious Microsoft badged IP). The retail TTF's Ascender is offering are the latest shipping versions of these fonts. These may be important to people who need complete compatibility with the Office or Windows version of a given font.   
   
Cheers, Si
